article.title: Wesley Assigned to Office of the Deputy Chief of Staff, G-8

tags.tag: Office of the U.S. Army Deputy Chief of Staff G-8

article.abstract: Brig. Gen. Eric J. Wesley, USA, has been assigned as deputy director, program analysis and evaluation, Office of the Deputy Chief of Staff, G-8, U.S. Army, Washington, District of Columbia.
article.text: Brig. Gen. Eric J. Wesley, USA, has been assigned as deputy director, program analysis and evaluation, Office of the Deputy Chief of Staff, G-8, U.S. Army, Washington, District of Columbia.
